section.heading: Rules.
section.text: The Mayor may issue rules necessary to implement this subchapter pursuant to subchapter I of Chapter 5 of Title 2.

annotations.annotation: For temporary addition of chapter, see § 2-4 of the HIV Testing of Certain Criminal Offenders Emergency Act of 1992 (D.C. Act 9-318, November 24, 1992, 39 DCR 9016).
